summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackMixsoon’s Bean Cleansing Oil is an ultra-lightweight K-Beauty cleansing oil that instantly dissolves makeup, excess oil, and pore impurities. Light enough for even very oily skin, this double cleansing essential supports elasticity, hydration, and balance with fermented barley and soybean extracts.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly dissolves SPF and waterproof makeupHydrates and balances oily skinImproves skin texture and elasticityNon-stripping formula perfect for sensitive skinSupports a healthy, resilient skin barrierLeaves skin soft, smooth, and refreshedKey IngredientsSoybean Ferment – Strengthens the skin barrier, floods skin with moisture, and smooths signs of aging.Barley Ferment – Delivers deep hydration, soothes redness, and boosts skin’s bounce and firmness.Pomegranate Ferment – Packed with antioxidants to combat fine lines and early aging.Korean Pear Ferment – Brightens dull skin and visibly fades dark spots.Jojoba Oil – Balances oil levels by mimicking skin’s natural moisturizers.Item 2643830How To UseGently massage 2-3 pumps of product on dry face.Emulsify product by adding a small amount of water and gently massage.Rinse off with lukewarm water.IngredientsEthylhexyl Palmitate, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Triethylhexanoin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Fragrance, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Water, Propanediol, Glycerin, Lactobacillus/Pear Juice Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract (2.5ppm), Saccharomyces/Barley Seed Ferment Filtrate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently massage 2-3 pumps of product on dry face.Emulsify product by adding a small amount of water and gently massage.Rinse off with lukewarm water.

reviews.headline: Lovely
reviews.comments: First time using this product and I love the way it works you just have to follow the instructions and it goes perfectly working next to the micellar water it leave my face fresh

reviews.headline: It's an oil cleanser
reviews.comments: Exactly what the title says. It's an oil cleanser, it's average. It has a fresh laundry scent to it.

faceoff_positive.comments: I was a little skeptical about this oil cleanser. Let me tell you that I loved it. My combination skin feels so soft not oily at all. It turns to a silky white when you remove with water. The smell is so fabulous. I really love this product!
faceoff_positive.headline: Bean Cleansing Oil 195ml

faceoff_negative.comments: Quite disappointed with their poor delivery packaging! Given how expensive their products are and they dont seem to care. With your poor customer service, this is how you will lose good customers!
faceoff_negative.headline: Mixsoon Bean Cleansing Oil 195 ml
